script:
1). Are you coming to the office party next week?
Most people don't really take their jobs very seriously, do they?
I wouldn't miss it for the world. It's usually great fun. 
I suppose most people will have too much to drink.
2). Do you like detective stories?
I haven't finished that book about the North Pole.
No, I find them very uninteresting. 
No, I haven't seen the latest James Bond film.
3). Most of the books in this library are very old, aren't they?
I don't go to the library very often.
I usually buy books I like in second-hand bookshops.
I suppose they can't afford to keep up with the cost of buying new books.
